p: The data repository, including gridded emission, land-use, and CO 2 concentration data, is stored on Harvard Dataverse (Data Citation 1) and the AIM modelling team website (Data Citation 2). For the latter database, the data are available in two locations ( http://www.nies.go.jp/doi/10.18959/20180403.001-e.html, http://www-iam.nies.go.jp/aim/data_tools/aimssp/aimssp.html ). The file format for the gridded file is NetCDF version 4, which is used widely in the climate research community. The gridded emissions and land-use data are represented in 0.5° × 0.5° grids, totalling 259,200 pixels globally.
